Azure Architecture for Healthcare Platform

Deployment Process:
- Manual deployments via Azure Portal clicking
- No version control for infrastructure configurations
- Production changes made directly without testing
- Different configurations across dev/test/prod environments managed in spreadsheets

Development Practices:
- No code review process
- No automated testing
- Developers deploy directly to production
- No coding standards or style guides documented

Monitoring:
- Basic Azure Monitor metrics viewed manually
- No Application Insights configured
- No centralized logging solution
- Alerts configured reactively after incidents occur

Operations:
- No runbooks or operational procedures documented
- On-call rotation managed via email
- No incident response plan
- Team knowledge resides with individual developers
- No postmortems conducted after outages

Infrastructure:
- Resources provisioned manually through portal
- No infrastructure as code practices
- Configuration drift across environments
- No automated testing of infrastructure changes
